text: aur kuphphaar kahane lage ki ham par to qayaamat aaegee hee nahin (ai rasool) tum kah do ho (ho) mujh ko apane us aalemul gaib paravaradigaar kee qasam hai jisase zarra baraabar (koee cheez) na aasamaan mein chhipee huee hai aur na zameen mein ki qayaamat zaroor aaegee aur zarre se chhotee cheez aur zarre se badee (garaz jitanee cheeze hain sab) vaajee va raushan kitaab lauhe mahaphooz mein mahaphooz hain
